item.title: GarVerseLOD: High-Fidelity 3D Garment Reconstruction from a Single In-the-Wild Image using a Dataset with Levels of Details
item.description: GarVerseLOD introduces a novel dataset and framework for high-fidelity 3D garment reconstruction from a single image, achieving unprecedented robustness via a hierarchical approach and leveraging a ma…
